SELECT a.Idx AS idx, a.MUnitIdx AS munitidx, a.EntryTitle AS entryTitle, b.UCICODE AS ucicode FROM TEntry a, TEntryUCI b WHERE 1=1 AND a.Idx = b.EntryIdx
AND (a.EntryTitle LIKE '%'+#{entryTitle}+'%' OR a.Tag LIKE '%'+#{entryTitle}+'%')
AND MUnitIdx = #{munitidx}
AND (MUnitIdx = 995 OR MUnitIdx = 996 OR MUnitIdx = 997 OR MUnitIdx = 998 OR MUnitIdx = 999 OR MUnitIdx = 1000)
ORDER BY a.EntryTitle ASC
SELECT recType, content FROM TEntryData WHERE entryIdx = #{entryIdx} AND parentIdx=0 AND delFlag=0 ORDER BY sortNo ASC
